reviewText:
Very buggy. Should not be released.
I wish Steam could give some of these titles a brief test.
This thing is frozen at about week 6 of recruiting.
Does not advance, can't save, just have to exit out.

Like many of the others reviewing this, I also found it to crash. I didn't even get to any actual games before it crashed the first time, and every time I load it up it crashes again, and starting a new file crashes it.
